price: Ka ce: "Kõwa mai tsumãye ne. Sai ku yi tsumãye. Sa'an nan zã ku san su wa ne ma'abũta tafarki madaidaici, kuma wane ne ya nẽmi shiryuwa."
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu al-ṣirāṭi al-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
